SEARCH
Module com.example.demo
Package com.example.demo.controller

Class Control_Setting

java.lang.Object
com.example.demo.controller.Control_Setting
public class Control_Setting extends Object
The Control_Setting class is responsible for managing the settings interface in the game. It allows the user to toggle background music and explosion sound effects, and provides the functionality to close the settings window.

  • Field Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description

    private javafx.scene.control.CheckBox

    A checkbox to toggle the explosion sound effect on or off.

  • Field Details

    • bgToggle

      private javafx.scene.control.CheckBox bgToggle
      A checkbox to toggle the background music on or off. This enables the user to enable or disable the background music during gameplay.

    • gsToggle

      private javafx.scene.control.CheckBox gsToggle
      A checkbox to toggle the explosion sound effect on or off. This enables the user to enable or disable the explosion sound during gameplay.

    • closeButton

      private javafx.scene.control.Button closeButton
      The button used to close the settings window. It exits the game or closes the current settings view.

    • mainRoot

      private javafx.scene.layout.Pane mainRoot
      The root container of the main user interface. It holds all the UI components for the main screen.

  • Constructor Details

    • Control_Setting

      public Control_Setting()
      Default constructor for the Control_Setting class. Initializes default values for the fields.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the settings interface by adding event listeners to the toggle checkboxes and setting their initial values based on the current settings.

    • addHoverSoundToButton

      private void addHoverSoundToButton(javafx.scene.control.Button button)
      Adds a hover sound effect to the specified button.
      Parameters:
      button - The button to which the hover sound effect will be added.

    • toggleBackgroundMusic

      private void toggleBackgroundMusic(boolean play)
      Toggles the background music on or off based on the provided boolean value.
      Parameters:
      play - If true, background music is enabled; if false, background music is paused.

    • toggleExplosionSound

      private void toggleExplosionSound(boolean play)
      Toggles the explosion sound effect on or off based on the provided boolean value.
      Parameters:
      play - If true, explosion sound is enabled; if false, explosion sound is disabled.

    • setMainRoot

      public void setMainRoot(javafx.scene.layout.Pane mainRoot)
      Sets the root container of the main interface, used to remove the blur effect when closing the settings window.
      Parameters:
      mainRoot - The root container of the main interface.

    • closeSettings

      private void closeSettings()
      Closes the settings window and removes the blur effect from the main interface.
